articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for ASEAN Regional Forum
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for ASEAN Regional Forum
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho left here Saturday to take part in the ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum due in the Philippines.

articles.title: New 3D Films Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
New 3D Films Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The Research Institute of Cinema Science of the DPRK recently produced new 3D films.
					 According to Kim Pyong Gon, a department head of the institute who is also one of manufacturers, new 3D films deals with the ecology of animals and their skills as well as action scenes gathered from cartoons.
					
					 Among those new 3D films are "Animals at Central Zoo", "Skilled Salmon-hunter", "Sea Carnivores" and "An Aspect of Polar Bear's Life", all of which give vivid and rich knowledge about the animal world to viewers.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Make Responsible Option
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Make Responsible Option
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S., stunned by the DPRK's successful second test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14, is going reckless.
					 Political and military circles have claimed that they would bring down the DPRK by igniting a war and take a destructive military action and that they are ready to use rapid, fatal and sweeping armed forces".
					
					 The U.S. let its B-1Bs fly into the sky above the Korean peninsula in a bid to present a "show of force to the north" and put on standby for sortie its F-35B, B-2 and other types of war planes based in Japan and Guam.
					
					 And it, together with the south Korean puppet forces, has staged missile-launching drill and intercepting-missile test presupposing the DPRK's ballistic rockets, allegedly to increase the military pressure upon the DPRK to the maximum.
					
					 This is a hysteric fit of those taken aback by the DPRK's continued demonstration of nuclear attack capabilities.
					
					 The more desperately the U.S. works to realize its ambition for "nuclear dismantlement of the north" through "maximum pressure and engagement", the more dynamically the DPRK has stepped up diversifying and modernizing the nuclear force before the U.S. and its vassal forces come to their senses.
					
					 Hwasong-12, Pukguksong-2 and other new types of strategic weapons showed their capabilities for actual war. And the successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14, a final gateway to the completion of the country's nuclear force, proved that the U.S. mainland is within the striking range of the DPRK's weapons.
					
					 After 20-odd days, the DPRK carried out the second test-fire of Hwasong-14, dealing a telling blow at the empire of evils which is slapping extreme sanctions while letting out senseless war rhetoric.
					
					 The day when the DPRK is provoked means the end of the U.S. This is our stern warning.
					
					 To the DPRK, the call for military pressure made by the U.S. without reason sounds no more than rubbish and shriek of aggressor and rogue state stunned by the rapid development of the former's nuclear force and its might.
					
					 The policy-makers of the U.S. are so mean in their thinking faculty as they desperately try to check the DPRK's rapid progress toward the modernization of nuclear force while making bluff.
					
					 The U.S. should judge the trend properly, though belatedly, and make a responsible option.
					
					 If the U.S. provokes the DPRK by brandishing the nuclear club, despite its warning, the latter will clearly show its mettle with the nuclear strike means of justice.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Il Sung's Feats for Building of Prosperous Powerful Country
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Il Sung's Feats for Building of Prosperous Powerful Country
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article praises the feats President Kim Il Sung performed to lay an eternal foundation for building a prosperous country under the banner of independence.
					 The article says:
					
					 Under the banner of independence, the President provided the most scientific and encyclopedic guidelines for victorious advance of the Korean revolution and the socialist cause and the precious revolutionary spirit and made gigantic social reforms, turning the country into an invincible power.
					
					 Having formulated independence as the principle of revolution, he adhered to the principle of adopting all lines and policies with the Korean revolution put at center.
					
					 The lines of attaching importance to the ideology, military affairs and science and technology, the people-first spirit, the self-development-first principle and the line of the three revolutions--ideological, technical and cultural, the validity and vitality of which have been fully demonstrated in the course of advance in the new century of Juche, are based on the revolutionary idea of independence the President had adhered to in the whole period of the revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He did not compromise to others in the least in carving out the destiny of the country and the people by force of Juche in a responsible manner, never pardoned those who hurt the dignity of the nation even a bit, advanced in the offensive spirit of Mt Paektu without hesitation no matter what hardships might stand in the way and valued and firmly preserved the Juche character and national character.
					
					 Thanks to his trust and attachment for things of our own, self-pride and confidence and revolutionary leadership, characterized by strong self-respect to exalt things of our own to the world, self-reliance has become the fighting spirit and method peculiar to the Korean people. And socialism of Juche, dignified for independence, powerful thanks to the Songun politics and prosperous by creation and reforms, has emerged on this land.

articles.title: DPRK's Will to Bolster Nuclear Force Is Unshakable: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Will to Bolster Nuclear Force Is Unshakable: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- It is the firm faith and unshakable will of the Korean army and people to keep to the bolstering of nuclear force for self-defense under the banner of the line for simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts until they have wiped out the U.S. imperialists and their followers seeking to stifle the DPRK's sovereignty and right to existence, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article.
					 The U.S. imperialists' scheme to isolate and strangle the DPRK remains unchanged, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 U.S. policy-makers are never aware of the invincible mightiness and inexhaustible potentials for development of Juche Korea. Tragic is that they have not yet understood why the U.S. has always sustained defeats only in decades-long standoff with the DPRK.
					
					 Neither sanctions nor military threats would work on the DPRK which is advancing under the banner of self-reliance and self-development with its people rallied as one in mind around the great leader and the great Party. War rackets and extreme sanctions trumpeted by the U.S. warmongers would rather embolden the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear force.
					
					 The successful second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14 is a stern warning to the U.S. which is running like a headless chicken, talking nonsense without decorum.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Court's Judgment
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Court's Judgment
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- There took place the first trial over the "case of blacklisted persons of culture and arts" in south Korea.
					 The puppet Seoul Central District Court sentenced to light punishment seven persons responsible for the case, including Kim Ki Chun, former presidential chief of staff of Chongwadae. And it set free Jo Yun Son, former minister of the Culture, Sports and Tourism who was directly involved in the case, on the pretext of probation, claiming that "suspicion against him has not been recognized".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary slams this as an intolerable insult to the mind-set of candlelight holders demanding the liquidation of Park Geun Hye's evils.
					
					 This is not an issue that goes unnoticed, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The "case of blacklisted persons", which stunned the whole south Korean society, is a practice such vile "yusin" remnants as Kim Ki Chun conducted at the personal order and wire-pulling of traitor Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Therefore, the unjust judgment of the court gives Park, the wirepuller of the case, breathing spell. In other words, there lies a sinister intention of the puppet court to give influence upon the judgment on Park through the trial and thus hush it up.
					
					 However, the puppet court's vicious trick can not work on the south Korean people. The court should pay heed to the voices of the angry public that "it should make correct judgment before candlelight action is launched again" and "the people will opt for judicial reform".

articles.title: Serious Soldier Abuse in S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Serious Soldier Abuse in S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Soldiers of the south Korean puppet army have been physically abused, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 A civic organization disclosed the fact that the wife of the second operation commander of the south Korean puppet army worked the sentries like a beast of burden regarding them as her servants.
					
					 She forced them to do her washings and ironing and clean the toilet and even her toenails on the floor.

articles.title: THAAD Can't Intercept ICBM of North: S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
THAAD Can't Intercept ICBM of North: S. Korean Paper
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on July 31 said in an editorial that THAAD cannot intercept ICBM of the DPRK.
					 The south Korean authorities, much upset by the DPRK's successful second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14, introduced nuclear strategic bombers of the U.S. and conducted military acts of aggravating the tension on the Korean peninsula, the paper charged.
					
					 The paper stressed that THAAD is a weapon system for intercepting medium-short range missiles and it is quite impossible to intercept ICBM of the north with this system.

articles.title: July 27 in DPRK Will Last Forever: Nigerian Figure
articles.content:
July 27 in DPRK Will Last Forever: Nigerian Figure
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism, paid a congratulatory visit to the DPRK embassy in Lagos on July 24 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The chairman laid a bouquet before the picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung brought about the brilliant victory in the war by smashing the U.S. imperialist aggressors.
					
					 The DPRK demonstrated before the world its dignity and might as an ICBM possessor under the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un while foiling the U.S. nuclear war threat.
					
					 The victory won by the DPRK on July 27 will shine forever.

articles.title: Russian Media Observes Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle
articles.content:
Russian Media Observes Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers and internet websites featured articles from July 21 to 24 to observe the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The newspaper Zavtra said in an article:
					
					 The U.S. hurled one third of its army, one fifth of its air force and majority of its Pacific Fleet, mercenaries from 15 satellite countries by abusing the name of the UN, south Korean puppet forces and Japanese militarists into the Korean War. The troops numbered more than 2 million in total. The U.S. also mobilized huge combat and technical materials and used 73 million tons of war materiel.
					
					 But the loss of troops and military hardware suffered by the U.S. in the war was so huge that it was 2.3 times bigger than that it had suffered in the Pacific War.
					
					 Its another article titled "Purpose of GIs' presence in south Korea" gave a detailed account of the facts proving the criminal nature of the U.S. which had inflicted untold misfortune and pain upon the Korean people more than a century ago. It stressed that the U.S. is increasing tensions on the Korean peninsula to an extreme pitch in a bid to perpetuate its military presence in south Korea.
					
					 Articles demanding the dissolution of the UN Command and immediate withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea were posted on Russian websites such as Patrioti Moskva and Today's DPRK.

articles.title: Delegacion coreana parte para la reunion ministerial de ASEAN
articles.content:
Delegacion coreana parte para la reunion ministerial de ASEAN
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- La delegacion de la RPDC, encabezada por el canciller Ri Yong Ho, salio el dia 5 de esta capital para participar en la reunion ministerial del Foro Regional de la Asociacion de Naciones del Sudeste Asiatico (ASEAN) que se efectuara en Filipinas.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe tomar opcion responsable: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe tomar opcion responsable: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- EE.UU. anda descabellado desde que cogio panico al exito en el segundo lanzamiento del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-14" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En el circulo politico y el militar de ese pais se escuchan los disparates tales como derrumbar al Norte (de Corea) con la guerra, tomar la accion militar destructiva y estar dispuesto al uso rapido, mortifero y aplastante de las fuerzas armadas.
					
					EE.UU. llevo a cabo la llamada "demostracion de fuerzas armadas contra el Norte" despachando al cielo de la Peninsula Coreana los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares B-1B y esta listo para enviar a cualquier hora el caza ultramoderno Stealth F-35B, el bombardero Stealth B-2 y otros que se encuentran en la isla Guam y la base militar norteamericana en Japon.
					
					Anunciando recrudecer al maximo la presion militar sobre la RPDC, realizo uno tras otro con los titeres surcoreanos el ejercicio de disparo de misiles y la prueba de interceptacion de los simulados cohetes balisticos del Norte.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. elevaba el grado de sancion y presion con el deseo de "cancelar las armas nucleares del Norte de Corea" mediante la politica de "maxima presion y compromiso", la RPDC vino acelerando la diversificacion y el desarrollo en alto nivel de las fuerzas armadas nucleares dejando consternados a EE.UU. y sus satelites.
					
					Manifesto la capacidad combativa de armas estrategicas de nuevo tipo como "Hwasong-12" y "Pukguksong-2".
					
					Con el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del ICBM "Hwasong-14", ultima fase para completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, expuso en claro que todo el territorio norteamericano esta al alcance de fuego de la RPDC.
					
					Dio otro golpe fuerte en la cabeza del imperio yanqui, que amenaza con la sancion extremada y hace el estupido anuncio de guerra anti-RPDC, al ejecutar el segundo lanzamiento de "Hwasong-14" a los 20 dias y pico desde el primero.
					
					Esto significa la advertencia severa de que se dara punto final a la misma existencia de EE.UU. si este se atreve a atacar a la RPDC.
					
					Para nosotros, la tonteria de presion militar de EE.UU. no es mas que el alarido del Estado agresor y gangster atemorizado ante el poderio y desarrollo rapido de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					Es muy pueril la facultad pensativa de los elaboradores de politica de EE.UU. que se muestran fanfarrones para impedir el rapido desarrollo de fuerzas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. debe tomar la opcion responsable al ver bien la corriente de la epoca actual aunque tardiamente.
					
					Si los imperialistas norteamericanos se atreven a la aventura militar esgrimiendo el garrote nuclear a pesar de la advertencia de la RPDC, esta les dara lecciones con los medios de ataque nuclear de justicia.
